summary: Mod that adds a small Nordic Ruins Dungeon North-East of Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a small Nordic Ruins Dungeon North-East of Whiterun called, "Joric's Tomb." This is my very first mod so the dungeon is on the small side, and is also loosely based on the Bethesda Tutorial. 

[size=3]DESCRIPTION:[/size]

[i]Necromancers have taken over most of the ruins, but they have not been able to get into the inner sanctum where the Ancient Nord Hero "Joric" is said to be laid to rest. Find a way into the tomb to stop the necromancers' plans and make sure the dead stay dead, or secure the treasure within for your own devious purposes.[/i]

[size=3]INFO:[/size]

This mod adds a small Nordic Ruins Dungeon North-East of Whiterun.
Approximately 8 mins of gameplay.
It should only conflict with other mods that change the exterior cells used by this mod.
It does NOT require any DLC.

[size=3]INSTALLATION:[/size]

I HIGHLY recommend using a mod manager such as Nexus Mod Manager or Mod Organizer for installation of all mods.
To instal this mod manually, simply drag the Joric'sTomb.esp file into your Skyrim Data folder. Make sure before you play the game that it is checked under "Data Files" when you first open Skyrim.

[size=3]UNINSTALLATION:[/size]

I HIGHLY recommend using a mod manager such as Nexus Mod Manager or Mod Organizer for uninstallation of all mods.
To uninstall this mod manually, simply remove the Joric'sTomb.esp file from your Skyrim Data folder. That's all there is to it. 

[size=3]CHANGELOG:
[/size]
Version 1.1

[size=2]Cleaned up and finalized NavMesh[/size]
[list][*]This should fix any strange pathing glitches in the exterior cells as well as allow followers to enter and exit the dungeon with you. 
[/*]
[/list]
author: PixelGrimm
